definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: This paper describes how a full word changes into an empty word by this new unit.
sentences.chinese: 實詞虛化是語言發展中一種重要的現象。

sentences.english: These multiword utterances are usually the "substantive" or "content" words that carry the main message.
sentences.chinese: 存在於多語句中的通常是一些表達主要信息的實詞。

sentences.english: Morphology comprises notional words and function words.
sentences.chinese: 詞法部分包括實詞和虛詞。
